item.name: Mithrenfire
item.text:
Once consumed, you feel warm and energetic. For one day all Constitution saving throws are with advantage and all Wisdom saving throws are with disadvantage.
Source: Monsters of Feyland p. 10 (Third Party)

item.name: Golden Mushroom
item.text:
Once consumed, it grants the benefit of a short rest.
Source: Monsters of Feyland p. 11 (Third Party)

item.name: Bumbleberry
item.text:
Once consumed, you make all Dexterity checks and saving throws at disadvantage for one day.
Source: Monsters of Feyland p. 29 (Third Party)

item.name: Slumberberry
item.detail: flora, spherical white berry with black spots
item.text:
Once consumed, you fall asleep for 10 minutes. If you take any damage or someone uses an action to wake you, you regain consciousness immediately.
Source: Monsters of Feyland p. 30 (Third Party)

item.name: Dumgi Fungi
item.detail: flora, red mushroom with white spots
item.text:
Once consumed, your Intelligence score is lowered by 2 for a day.
Source: Monsters of Feyland p. 31 (Third Party), Monsters of the Underworld p. 11 (Third Party)

item.name: Mumbleberry
item.text:
Once consumed, you make all Charisma checks at disadvantage for one day.
Source: Monsters of Feyland p. 52 (Third Party)

item.name: Moon Fruit
item.text:
Once consumed, you gain resistance to necrotic damage for one day.
Source: Monsters of Feyland p. 76 (Third Party)

item.name: Rainbow Apple
item.text:
Once consumed, you change your gender for one day.
Source: Monsters of Feyland p. 90 (Third Party)

item.name: Gluttonberry
item.text:
Once consumed, you make all ability checks and saving throws at disadvantage until you eat.
Source: Monsters of Feyland p. 96 (Third Party)

item.name: Fizzberry
item.text:
Explosive berry which can be thrown 20 feet. 1d8 force damage in a 10 foot radius.
Source: Monsters of Feyland p. 106 (Third Party)

item.name: Starflower
item.text:
A bright, white star-shaped flower that grows on floating islands. Upon eating this flower, you gain a flying speed of 60 feet for ten minutes.
Source: Monsters of Feyland 2 p. 32 (Third Party)

item.name: Sadieberry
item.text:
When you consume this berry, you can walk on water for 1d10 minutes.
Source: Monsters of Feyland 2 p. 54 (Third Party)

item.name: Hystranger
item.text:
These talking flowers strike up conversations with newcomers to Feyland. They offer vague, but sometimes helpful advice. Hystrangers need a great deal more water than most plants.
Source: Monsters of Feyland 2 p. 69 (Third Party)

item.name: Sweetblossom
item.detail: flora, pink and yellow heart-shaped flower
item.text:
After you smell this flower, you make any Charisma checks or saving throws with advantage for 1 minute. You can gain this benefit only once per day.
Source: Monsters of Feyland 2 p. 106 (Third Party)

item.name: Bag of Treats
item.text:
This bright red bag is made of simple cloth. You can use an action to reach inside and retrieve delicious desserts for 1d8 humanoids. Once the bag is used, it doesn't function again until the next dawn. The bag weighs 1 pound.
Source: Monsters of Feyland 2 p. 26 (Third Party)

item.name: Never Cloak
item.text:
A golden hooded cloak. You can use a bonus action to put the cloak's hood up to activate it. While activated you can cast the misty step spell three times a day.
Source: Monsters of Feyland 2 p. 72 (Third Party)

item.name: Butterfly Fan
item.text:
This stylish blue fan is decorated with painted pink butterflies. You can use an action to conjure a swarm of pink butterflies in a 60-foot radius centered on yourself for one minute. The area is heavily obscured, and you can use a bonus action to take the Dash action. Once used, the fan doesn't function again until the next dawn.
Source: Monsters of Feyland 2 p. 104 (Third Party)

item.name: Alice's Ring
item.text:
When wearing this blue ring, you can use an action to shrink yourself as if you cast enlarge/reduce on yourself. The ring has 3 charges. Each use of the ring expends 1 charge. The ring regains all expended charges daily at dawn.
Source: Monsters of Feyland 2 p. 143 (Third Party)
